description: This file defines Flutter widgets and classes for rendering web content using an in-app WebView component, specifically loading HTML assets from the application's bundled assets and displaying a list menu to select different HTML screens.

classes.name: HtmlScreenRoute
classes.description: Represents a route to an HTML screen with a title and asset path.

classes.name: HtmlAssetWebViewPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays an HTML asset within an in-app webview, with loading indicator and permission handling.

classes.name: _HtmlAssetWebViewPageState
classes.description: State class managing the WebView, loading HTML asset, and UI states.

classes.name: HtmlScreensHomePage
classes.description: A StatelessWidget providing a menu list to select and navigate to different HTML screens.

methods.name: _loadHtml
methods.description: Loads HTML content from assets into the webview controller and sets the base URL.
